amendment.description: An amendment numbered 14 printed in Part B of House Report 118-602 to prohibit funds made available by this Act to be used for a Diversity, Equity, Inclusion, and Accessibility (DEIA) Council at the Department of the Interior.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
